channel.title: PAYDAY: The Hiest
channel.description:
So this game just came out for PC today. Medium size download game for 20$
Anyone else here have this / was interested in it? I have it and have been playing it a bit. Gameplay feels a lot like Left 4 Dead with a progression system. Its a bit of a crappy console port atm but the devs have claimed to be addressing these issues in a patch.
My biggest problem with it is not having any friends who own it (Akin to l4d it is a game that seems like it would be sooo much better with friends), so does anyone have it and would wanna play it some time?

item.title: PAYDAY: The Hiest
item.dc:creator: Ramirezoid
item.description:
It looks pretty fun, not a fan of the whole killer klownz thing

Read full topic

item.title: PAYDAY: The Hiest
item.dc:creator: Surplus
item.description:
The gameplay itself plays out like l4d in a sense (IE semi-random and going to do certain tasks), but because you are fighting enemies with guns and its robbing stuff it doesn’t feel like l4d the pacing is a lot different.

Read full topic

item.title: PAYDAY: The Hiest
item.dc:creator: Kairouseki
item.description:
It sounded interesting when I thought it was kind of like a bank robbing simulation but now it sounds boring being “Left4Dead with cops” as I’ve heard it described.

Read full topic
